SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.jface.text

Interface ITextViewerExtension6

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectionViewer, SourceViewer, TextConsoleViewer, TextViewer
public interface ITextViewerExtension6
Extension interface for ITextViewer. Introduces the concept of text hyperlinks and adds access to the undo manager.
Since:
3.1
See Also:
  • IHyperlink
  • IHyperlinkDetector

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IUndoManager
    getUndoManager()
    Returns this viewer's undo manager.
    void
    setHyperlinkDetectors(IHyperlinkDetector[] hyperlinkDetectors, int eventStateMask)
    Sets this viewer's hyperlink detectors for the given state mask.

  • Method Details

    • setHyperlinkDetectors

      void setHyperlinkDetectors(IHyperlinkDetector[] hyperlinkDetectors, int eventStateMask)
      Sets this viewer's hyperlink detectors for the given state mask.
      Parameters:
      hyperlinkDetectors - the new array of hyperlink detectors, null or an empty array to disable hyperlinking
      eventStateMask - the SWT event state mask to activate hyperlink mode

    • getUndoManager

      IUndoManager getUndoManager()
      Returns this viewer's undo manager.
      Returns:
      the undo manager or null if it has not been plugged-in
      Since:
      3.1
